name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized HTTP Exfiltration
description: This playbook addresses an incident where unauthorized communication was used for data exfiltration over HTTP, detailing response steps to block the attack and conduct security checks.

action--5c063f7b-c80a-4b8f-aa20-415d6e7e.name: Block outgoing HTTP requests
action--5c063f7b-c80a-4b8f-aa20-415d6e7e.description: Block any outgoing HTTP requests from compromised host to prevent further data exfiltration.

action--7f893d43-bb34-495b-8c75-45c40c92.name: Kill unauthorized process
action--7f893d43-bb34-495b-8c75-45c40c92.description: Terminate the unauthorized application that facilitated exfiltration.

parallel--4b12378e-aff5-404d-9e0e-cbbb59.name: Parallel Actions
parallel--4b12378e-aff5-404d-9e0e-cbbb59.description: Execute blocking outgoing requests and terminating unauthorized processes simultaneously.

action--ea33e5da-62d5-4160-a831-083fb7e4.name: Run security scan on compromised host
action--ea33e5da-62d5-4160-a831-083fb7e4.description: Perform a security scan on the compromised host to detect threats. Loop until there are no threats.
